backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining organizations, vendors, pricing plans, activity logs, user profiles, and interop context with owner/admin/user role detection and access-control checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two interop test‑suite features to documentation files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human‑written summaries for multiple frontend project files including micro‑apps, hooks, docs, and UI components.
frontend/docs/shared-interop-test-suite-: Outline describing test coverage for interop APIs with isolation, contract, multi‑tenant, workflow, and failure‑case scenarios.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes used across the frontend.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React container and main bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router setup mapping portal pages and micro‑apps into a TanStack Router tree wrapped with theme provider and toaster.
frontend/src/catalog/microAppsCatalog.ts: Typed catalog defining categories and metadata for all micro‑apps displayed in the portal.
frontend/src/components/CategoryBadge.ts: Small badge component showing a micro‑app’s category with themed colors and icon.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Language selector dropdown using the i18n system to switch locales.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity auth and clearing React Query cache on sign‑out.
frontend/src/components/MicroAppCard.tsx: Clickable card component that displays a micro‑app’s icon, name, category, and description and navigates to its detail page.
frontend/src/components/OrgSwitcher.tsx: Dropdown control for selecting or clearing the active organization, updating the user profile and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/PortalLayout.tsx: Main layout with header navigation, authentication-aware menus, mobile menu handling, and optional profile setup prompt.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter name and email, saving the profile via mutation with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/RequireRole.tsx: Wrapper enforcing authentication and role-based access, showing descriptive alerts when access is denied.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and managing the backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, logout, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useInteropContext.ts: Hooks to fetch interop context (profile, org, role) and log activity with active-org awareness using backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, organizations, roles, admin status, and other backend data via an actor.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Sets up a Zustand‑based i18n store with persistence and utilities for translating keys using English and Spanish dictionaries.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.ts: Provides the English translation dictionary for UI strings across navigation, pages, and common components.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/es.ts: Provides the Spanish translation dictionary mirroring the English keys for full UI localization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and shared UI styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders an admin dashboard showing metrics and recent activity, gated by admin permissions and translated UI text.
frontend/src/pages/MicroAppDirectoryPage: Implements a searchable, filterable directory of micro‑apps grouped by category with translated UI labels.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/AiPromptPla: Mock AI prompt playground showing prompt/response history and accepting new prompts.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/DaoProposal: Static DAO proposals viewer with mock proposals and basic vote UI.
Displays a mock community forum with topic cards, author info, and navigation back to the directory.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/Marketplace: Shows a vendor marketplace using user profile and vendor queries, with conditional states for loading, missing org, or empty vendor list.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/MessagingIn: Renders a mock messaging inbox with conversation list and placeholder message panel while logging activity on load.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/MicroAppShe: Loads a micro‑app by slug and displays themed metadata with a placeholder card if the app exists or an error message if not.
frontend/src/pages/microapps/SocialFeedS: Displays a mock social feed of posts and logs app‑open activity using user identity.
frontend/src/pages/OrganizationManagemen: Page for listing, creating, and joining organizations using dialogs and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/PortalHomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature highlights, and links to the directory.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPlansPage.tsx: Displays published pricing plans and allows admins to create new plans via a dialog.
Lists vendors for the active organization and allows authorized users to create or deactivate vendors.
frontend/src/theme/categoryTheme.ts: Defines color and icon themes for micro‑app categories and exports a helper to retrieve them.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Exports design tokens for colors, typography, spacing, radii, and shadows for consistent UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file defining portal goals, architecture notes, and a list of existing feature requirements for a multi-tenant ICP-based micro‑app platform.
